p: According to the ecological requirements of the species, we further refined the area of refugia that can sustain subpopulations and the corridors that can serve as priority sanctuaries. Such refugia were primarily located in the SNJ National Park and the Badong Natural Reserve, which suggests the high potential of these regions for use in preserving the population under climate change (Figure 4).
